text: Peder I. Ramsrud (10 February 1923 – 10 June 2014) was a Norwegian politician for the Progress Party. He was born in Fåberg in February 1923. Ramsrud was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Oppland in 1989, but was not re- elected in 1993. He was a member of Østre Toten municipality council from 1977 to 1985. From 1981 to 1991 he held various positions in Oppland county council. ==References== * Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Progress Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Peder I. Ramsrud
